title: Blended Language Teacher Qualification Program Utilizing Moodle

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level expertise in the field (grammar, vocabulary, text analysis) and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening blended instruction design and operation competencies using Moodle for in-service secondary teachers. Emphasizes digital tool integration to enhance linguistic expression and reading comprehension

learning_goals: On the Moodle platform, customized activities (quizzes, forums, assignments) can be designed and operated for each language course (reading, writing, listening, speaking).
Apply at least three interaction strategies (feedback, discussion, collaboration) to enhance learner engagement in blended learning environments.
Develop a Moodle-based language instruction model through project-based assessment and strengthen writing and reading guidance competencies by incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
